Laughably bad gameplay. How is this even a thing? How does this game even exist?

Crap game don't buy it the makers are as bad as EA this game is a good game for the submissive as in you like being dominated by a OP killer now with the new addition to the end where the killer can kill you with no issue if you made it that far by locking you in by shutting the hatch in witch time you will run for the gate only to find a long time to open said gate with the killer able to rub one off on you dead comrade and still have time to go  to said gate to find you still their holding the switch....also if you as a player feel like the game is unfair and decide to DC or if you had a good reason to such as a glitch that stops you from moving or working on gens you will be greeted with a wait time penalty that continues to increase every time you have to DC even if the killer was using a lagg switch or exploits no matter how the killer decides to cheat such as camp the hooks or tunnel you as a player need to just deal with it but don't DC because they will find another way to baby the killer and punish you.

Edit:12/12/2019

You think "this game can get any worse?" yeah it can i was expecting some new update or new killer to starting playing the game again but that didn't happen as expected, instead they continue with this weird tread of launching a killer and nerfing after some salty people complain, this game has its balance literally in favor of salty people and the nerfing of Oni just proves that, this comunity is a pit of uranium in the toxicity aspect at the point of driving normal people mad, and the funny part is that survivors don't want the balance in their favor just to escape no no no, they want to humiliate you as a killer, they want to laught at you with their friends in a random voice call, in this game if you want to have fun you are obliged to have friends because playing "killer" is not fun at all because you are not a killer actually, you are an entertainer, you are in a match to entertain a group of people and if you dare to kill them, outplay them or play outside their imaginary rules, then expect disconnects or after game salty rage followed up by them to get into forums to complaning about balance and Behaviour bending their knee.

Now a friendly advice, if you really want some fun with this type of game just wait, Last Year is a game that just launched and it has potential to compete with DBD and that game really knows what a power role is and its fun.

TLDR:Go play Last Year

I really enjoy this game, sadly people can troll lock you in a game if your the killer, but meh w.e biggest issue is just the same map over and over. I mean 100 dollars + for maps and characters, plus 20 dollars to even get the game going. That is asking alot of people especially new players looking to try it out. a free weekend with access to 3-4 characters and 2-3 maps kind sells the game short. I would play more if I had more access to maps because that is what really keeps it from gettin stale. But Honestly, I am not about to spend another 100 bucks to unlock characters. The game is for sure worth playing. But wait till the whole game/dlc goes on sale at least half off before u even bother.

The core gameplay loop for the Survivor is spawn, find a gen, repair the gen, repeat until you escape. The only interaction you have with the game while fixing gen's is a QTE, and this persists until the killer finds you. When the Killer finds you then the game becomes fun for the survivors thus why survivors like to "bully" killers. 

For Killers you may have cool abilities but half the time they don't help you or worse HINDER you from killing survivors. The killer goes around to find a survivor downs them or gets looped until they stop caring. if the survivor is downed they get hooked but by then 2 gens may have popped because the survivors brought broken perks and toolboxes. And if the Killer manages to kill all the survivors (which happens quite frequently at lower ranks) they may not pip because they weren't able to stop the gens from getting done even though the Killer KILLED EVERYONE. 

In summary:
Survivor is boring unless your being chased
Killer is fun until survivors try to win
There is no casual only ranked

It's a great game. However, there is pretty much no communication between you and your teammates other than a pointing emote and a "come here" emote. And also t-bagging if that counts. 

9/10 would get camped and tunneled again.

This game is a dump
The killer queues are long af and even if you are not that good at killer and are rank 10 or lower, you still are going against 3 rank 5 and up survs, just because they are 4 man swfing with their rank 12 friend.
Survivor solo queue is abismal its one of if not the most unenjoyable experiences this game has to offer.
The game is buggy and horribly balanced, its honestly so sad to watch a game with so much potential be butchered like this.

Proper good fun if you're a horror fan. I'm not good at it, don't get me wrong, but depending on perks on both the killer and survivors, either side can be overpowered. It's like a frustrating game of cards, but like cards, it's addictive as hell

I believe this game is amazing, and after I got recommended by a friend to start playing, it quickly became one of my favorite games, my "main" and "grind" game, and I do actually recommend this to play with friends. It doesn't seem fun to start playing this game if you are planning to solo queue... "Later on", ( as in 4 hrs ) it will become more fun to play solo, even though playing with friends will always be the best way to do it. Overall funny and good to play (don't forget the bugs part)

After the patch of 2.7.0 today the trolls are over, now finally people are worried about finishing the generators quickly, they fixed several bugs that I found inside the game one of them the bug that caused the game to freeze when you reviewed the cosmetics in the store, now I can say that the game is more beautiful than before I hope to reach 1000 hours, each dollar is a good investment, thanks to you Dev <3

It was a sort of okay game up until the day I am making this review. Killers were semi-balanced, where there were builds that were impossible to survive such as insta-down huntress. After the recent update though it makes it near impossible to survive unless you're amazing and fast at this game. Endgame only has 2 minutes or you lose automatically as a survivor and killer and close hatch to prevent an escape and just patrol gates easily. It's especially hard when they buff ruin and make it harder to avoid the killers who already tunnel (chase you down after you get unhooked) and can just camp you to prevent you from escaping alive. I've played both ends of the spectrum and I say survivor is near impossible now in comparison to being a killer, especially since all the good survivor perks get debuffed because killers complain, such as Decisive Strike getting a massive nerf to be literally useless unless you get tunnelled, which they can just drop you right back off to waste your perk for the whole game. I would have to say wait until they decide to actually make survivors able to win again unless you think you can be a godly survivor in chases.
A great idea, in the anarchy. 3 years and still so much broken.

Tambi√©n tiene cosas que no gustan a las v√≠ctimas, como que un asesino est√© contigo o cerca cuando te cuelga, evitando as√≠ que te rescaten, lo que com√∫nmente se denomina *campear o que el asesino se centre siempre en la misma v√≠ctima, lo que se denomina "focalizar" o "tunelear".
